title: Creator Exhibition
short_description:
We would like to set up a room of stalls displaying the work of our society members, with a central table for art + crafts:
- The work shown will be a mix of art forms, including some showcases of 2D/3D models, cosplay projects and traditional/digital art pieces.
- As well as this, we're setting up a table with some arts + crafting supplies for people to come and try out on Sunday

schedule_organisation.name: Content Creation Society
schedule_organisation.description: Wonder what Content Creation Society is all about ? Well, it's a place for all sorts of media, where we aim to cater to a wide variety of creators!

schedule_venue.name: FAB0.19 Gallery
schedule_venue.description: The FAB Gallery will provide a variety of student art
